CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.NO_CERTIFICATIONS: You are not currently pursuing any certifications.
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.NO_LONGER_WORKING: No longer pursuing this certification or working with this certifier? No problem!
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.UNSUPPORTED_CERTIFICATION_MESSAGE_ONE: LiteFarm doesn’t currently generate documents for this certifier. However, we can export generic forms that are useful for most certifiers. You can select Export to create these forms or
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.UNSUPPORTED_CERTIFICATION_MESSAGE_TWO: to see if there are new certifiers available in your area.

CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.SUBTITLE_TWO: certifiers we work with in your country.
CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.TITLE: What type of certification?
CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.TOOLTIP: Don't see your certification? LiteFarm is dedicated to supporting sustainable agriculture and certifications are a big part of that. Request another certification here and we'll do our best to incorporate it in the app.

CERTIFIER_SELECTION.INFO: That probably means LiteFarm doesn't currently work with your certifier - sorry! LiteFarm does produce generic forms that are helpful in most cases though.
CERTIFIER_SELECTION.TITLE: Who is your certifier?

INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.PARAGRAPH: Do you plan to pursue or renew a certification this season?
INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.TITLE: Interested in certifications?
INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.WHY_ANSWER: LiteFarm generates forms required for organic certification. Some information will be mandatory.

REQUEST_CERTIFIER.LABEL: Requested Certifier
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.REQUEST: What certifier would you like to request?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_ONE: We're sorry - we don’t currently work with any
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_THREE: certifiers in your country. Would you like to request one?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_TWO: certifiers. Would you like to request one?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.TITLE: Request a certifier

SUMMARY.BAD_NEWS: LiteFarm doesn't currently collect the information you need to generate your certification documents - sorry!
SUMMARY.BAD_NEWS_INFO: However, we can create generic forms that are useful for most certifiers. We'll indicate this information throughout the app with a leaf icon.
SUMMARY.GOOD_NEWS: Good news! LiteFarm can gather the information you need to generate your certification documents!
SUMMARY.INFORMATION: We'll indicate this information throughout the app with a leaf icon.
SUMMARY.TITLE: You are interested in applying for:

CERTIFICATIONS.COULD_NOT_CONTACT_CERTIFIER: It looks like LiteFarm doesn’t currently export in the format of your certifier. You can still export your documents but your certifier may require additional information. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.FILES_ARE_READY: Your certification files are now ready to export. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.HAVE_ALL_INFO: It looks like LiteFarm has all the information we need to process your certification documents. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.NEXT_WE_WILL_CHECK: Next we'll check if your certifier requires any additional information to process your certification submission.
CERTIFICATIONS.NOTE_CANNOT_RESUBMIT: Note: Once you submit the survey you will not be able to edit your answers. To change them after submission, begin a new export.
CERTIFICATIONS.WHERE_TO_SEND_DOCS: Where do you want your documents sent?
CERTIFICATIONS.WOULD_LIKE_ANSWERS: Your certifier would like you to answer a few additional questions before we can export your documents.

STEP_ONE.DESCRIPTION: We've added support for certifications and certifiers! Want to see what’s available in your area?

STEP_TWO.DESCRIPTION: That’s okay! You can add certifications and certifiers later under “my farm”.

CROP_CATALOGUE.CAN_NOT_FIND: Can't find what you're looking for?
CROP_CATALOGUE.COVER_CROP: Can this be grown as a cover crop?
CROP_CATALOGUE.CROP_GROUP_TOOL_TIP: Selecting a crop group allows LiteFarm to pre-populate a lot of information about this crop such as growing season, nutritional values, and estimated annual yield. Don't worry, you can change these values below once you've selected a crop group.

CROP_CATALOGUE.NO_RESULTS_FOUND: No results found. Please change your filters.
CROP_CATALOGUE.NOMINATE_CROP: Nominate this crop for inclusion in the LiteFarm crop catalogue
CROP_CATALOGUE.NOMINATE_CROP_TOOLTIP: Nominating this crop for inclusion in the LiteFarm crop catalogue grants the LiteFarm team permission to share information about this crop with a specialist in your region. Approved crops will become part of the crop catalogue shown to all users.
CROP_CATALOGUE.SELECT_A_CROP: Select a crop to add it to your farm. Use search and filters to find crops more quickly.

CROP_DETAIL.ANNUAL_PERENNIAL: Is the crop an annual or perennial?

BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.EMPTY_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: No sensors found, please check your upload and try again.
BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Upload file must be a csv,

SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.ALREADY_OCCUPIED: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" already registered to another organization, please contact Ensemble support at support@esci.io to troubleshoot.
SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.DOES_NOT_EXIST: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" does not exist in the Ensemble database. Please ensure that you have spelled the External_ID properly for this entry, and that the sensor is an Ensemble sensor.
SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.INTERNAL_ERROR: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" failed to upload successfully, please reach out to LiteFarm support at support@litefarm.org to troubleshoot.

VALIDATION.EXTERNAL_ID: Invalid external id, must be between 1 and 40 characters.
VALIDATION.FILE_ROW_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: File row limit exceeded. The max number of sensors that can be uploaded from a file is 100.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_BRAND: Invalid brand name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_DEPTH: Invalid depth value, must be between 0 and 1000.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_HARDWARE_VERSION: Invalid hardware version name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_LATITUDE: Invalid latitude value, must be between -85 and 85. and fewer than 10 decimals.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_LONGITUDE: Invalid longitude value, must be between -180 and 180. and fewer than 10 decimals.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_MODEL: Invalid model name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_NAME: Invalid sensor name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_READING_TYPES: Invalid reading type detected: {{ reading_types }}. Valid values include: soil_water_content, soil_water_potential, temperature.

ERROR.BODY: LiteFarm generates biodiversity insights based on several sources and was unable to do so at this time. Please try again after {{minutes}} minutes.
ERROR.TITLE: There was a problem

BIODIVERSITY.INFO: Biodiversity is great for people and the planet. We count species richness from all known records of biodiversity within your farm boundary(ies). You can increase the crop biodiversity on your farm by planting new varieties. You can increase the non-crop biodiversity count on your farm by recording sightings on https://inaturalist.org/app

LOADING.BODY: We're generating the latest biodiversity insights for your farm. This can take up to 60 seconds.
LOADING.TITLE: Generating the latest biodiversity insights...

BIODIVERSITY.TITLE: Biodiversity

INSIGHTS.INFO: Insights provides added data insights into what is happening on your farm. The more data you provide in the application, the more insights can be generated. See individual insights for further information.

LABOUR_HAPPINESS.INFO: LiteFarm estimates labour happiness by averaging the satisfaction scores individuals enter when marking a task as completed.
LABOUR_HAPPINESS.TITLE: Labour Happiness

PRICES.INFO: We show you the trajectory of your sales prices against the sales prices for the same goods within a given distance of you, collected across the LiteFarm network.
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS: Network price is based on {{count}} farms in your local area
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS_one: Network price is based on {{count}} farm in your local area
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS_other: Network price is based on {{count}} farms in your local area
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS_plural: Network price is based on {{count}} farms in your local area
PRICES.NO_ADDRESS: You currently do not have an address in LiteFarm. Please update it in your Profile to get nearby prices information!
PRICES.TITLE: Prices

SOIL_OM.INFO: Soil organic matter is needed to maintain a healthy soil environment for your crops. We populate this insight from your most recent soil analysis task results. If you do not have any data we predict the potential soil organic matter for your location globally.
SOIL_OM.TITLE: Soil OM

INSIGHTS.TITLE: Insights

ESTIMATED_REVENUE.CALCULATION_DESCRIPTION: We calculate estimated revenue using the end date of crops estimated in the fields module. To include a crop in your estimated revenue calculation make sure you capture its end date within your financial report end date.
ESTIMATED_REVENUE.TITLE: Estimated Revenue

EXPENSE_DETAIL.TEMP_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this expenses?
EXPENSE_DETAIL.TITLE: Expense Detail

FINANCES.BALANCE_EXPLANATION: We compute a real-time balance (‘cost of production’) for each crop on your farm. This is a simple equation of expenses minus revenue.  Expenses for each crop are calculated from two parts, one part is the labour expenses from hours logged for farm activities, the other part is from the other expenses logged for the whole farm. Where expenses are logged for the whole farm we equally divide them amongst the crops on the farm. Unallocated means that a shift(s) has been submitted for a field when there is not a crop yet on that field. This shift(s) will be assigned to crops as they are added to that field within the financial reporting time window.
